gurmukhi: ੴ> ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ||
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ੧ ਮੰਗਲਾ ਚਰਣ
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕ ਕਵਾੳੁ ਪਸਾੳੁ ਕਰਿ ਓਅੰਕਾਰ ਅਨੇਕ ਅਕਾਰਾ
transliteration: Ik Kavaau Pasaau Kari Aoankaar Anayk Akaaraa.
translation: By one bang, the Oankar created and spread myriad of forms.

gurmukhi: ਪੳੁਣੁ ਪਾਣੀ ਬੈਸੰਤਰੋ ਧਰਤਿ ਅਗਾਸਿ ਨਿਵਾਸੁ ਵਿਥਾਰਾ
transliteration: Paounu Paanee Baysantaro Dharati Agaasi Nivaasu Vidaaraa.
translation: He extended His self in the form of air, water, fire, earth and sky etc.

gurmukhi: ਜਲ ਥਲ ਤਰਵਰ ਪਰਬਤਾਂ ਜੀਅ ਜੰਤ ਅਗਣਤ ਅਪਾਰਾ
transliteration: Jal Dal Taravar Parabataan Jeea Jant Aganat Apaaraa.
translation: He created water, land, trees, mountains and many biotic communities.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕੁ ਵਰਭੰਡੁ ਅਖੰਡੁ ਹੈ ਲਖ ਵਰਭੰਡ ਪਲਕ ਪਲਕਾਰਾ
transliteration: Iku Varabhandu Akhandu Hai Lakh Varabhand Palak Parakaaraa.
translation: That supreme creator Himself is indivisible and in one wink of an eye can create millions of universes.

gurmukhi: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਕੀਮ ਨ ਜਾਣੀਅੈ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਕਾਦਰੁ ਸਿਰਜਣਹਾਰਾ
transliteration: Kudarati Keem N Jaaneeai Kayvadu Kaadaru Sirajanahaaraa.
translation: When boundaries of His creation are unknowable, how can the expanse of that Creator be known?

gurmukhi: ਅੰਤੁ ਬਿਅੰਤ ਨ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰਾ ||੧||
transliteration: Antu Biantu N Paaraavaaraa ?1?
translation: No end is there of His extremes; they are infinite.

gurmukhi: ੨ ਓਹੋ ਹੀ
translation: Invocation

gurmukhi: ਕੇਵਡੁ ਵਡਾ ਅਾਖੀਅੈ ਵਡੇ ਦੀ ਵਡੀ ਵਡਿਅਾੲੀ
transliteration: Kayvadu Vadaa Aakheeai Vaday Dee Vadee Vadiaaee.
translation: How vast could He be said? The grandeur of the Great is great.

gurmukhi: ਵਡੀ ਹੂ ਵਡਾ ਅਾਖੀਅੈ ਸੁਣਿ ਸੁਣਿ ਅਾਖਣੁ ਅਾਖ ਸੁਣਾੲੀ
transliteration: Vadee Hoon Vadaa Vakhaaneeai Souni Souni Aakhanu Aakh Sounaaee.
translation: I relate what I have heard that He is said to be the greatest of the great.

gurmukhi: ਰੋਮ ਰੋਮ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਖਿਓਨੁ ਕਰਿ ਵਰਭੰਡ ਕਰੋੜ ਸਮਾੲੀ
transliteration: Rom Rom Vichi Rakhiaonu Kari Varabhand Karorhi Samaaee.
translation: Crores of universes reside in His trichome.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕੁ ਕਵਾੳੁ ਪਸਾੳੁ ਜਿਸੁ ਤੋਲਿ ਅਤੋਲੁ ਨ ਤੁਲਿ ਤੁਲਾੲੀ
transliteration: Iku Kavaau Pasaau Jisu Toli Atolu N Tuli Tulaaee.
translation: None could be compared with Him Who created and spread everything with one bang.

gurmukhi: ਵੇਦ ਕਤੇਬਹੁ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਅਕਥ ਕਹਾਣੀ ਕਥੀ ਨ ਜਾੲੀ
transliteration: Vayd Kataybahu Baaharaa Akad Kahaanee Kadee N Jaaee.
translation: He is beyond all the statements of the Vedas and the Katebas. His ineffable story is beyond all descriptions.

gurmukhi: ਅਬਿਗਤਿ ਗਤਿ ਕਿਵ ਅਲਖ ਲਖਾੲੀ ||੨||
transliteration: Abigati Gati Kiv Alakhu Lakhaaee ?2?
translation: How could His unmanifest dynamism by seen and understood?

gurmukhi: ੩ ਕੁਦਰਤ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਾਰੀਗਰੀ ਹੈ
translation: Craftsmanship is there in the creation

gurmukhi: ਜੀੳੁ ਪਾੲਿ ਤਨੁ ਸਾਜਿਅਾ ਮੁਹੁ ਅਖੀ ਨਕੁ ਕੰਨ ਸਵਾਰੇ
transliteration: Jeeu Paai Tanu Saajiaa Muhu Akhee Naku Kann Savaaray.
translation: Creating the jiva (self) He made his body and gave good shape to his mouth, nose, eyes and ears.

gurmukhi: ਹਥ ਪੈਰ ਦੇ ਦਾਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਸੁਭ ਦਿਸਟਿ ਦੁਅਾਰੇ
transliteration: Had Pair Day Daati Kari Sabad Surati Soubh Disati Duaaray.
translation: Gracefully He bestowed hands and feet, ears and consciousness for listening to the Word and eye for beholding goodness.

gurmukhi: ਕਿਰਤਿ ਵਿਰਤਿ ਪਰਕਿਰਤਿ ਬਹੁ ਸਾਸਿ ਗਿਰਾਸਿ ਨਿਵਾਸੁ ਸੰਜਾਰੇ
transliteration: Kirati Virati Par Kirati Bahu Saasi Giraasi Nivaasu Sanjaaray.
translation: For earning of the livelihood and other works, he infused life into body.

gurmukhi: ਰਾਗ ਰੰਗ ਰਸ ਪਰਸਦੇ ਗੰਧ ਸੁਗੰਧ ਸੰਧਿ ਪਰਕਾਰੇ
transliteration: Raag Rang Ras Parasaday Gandh Sougandh Sandhi Parakaaray.
translation: He bestowed various techniques of assimilation of music, colours, smells and fragrances.

gurmukhi: ਛਾਦਨ ਭੋਜਨ ਬੁਧਿ ਬਲੁ ਟੇਕ ਬਿਬੇਕ ਵੀਚਾਰ ਵੀਚਾਰੇ
transliteration: Chhaadan Bhojan Budhi Balu Tayk Bibayk Veechaar Veechaaray.
translation: For clothing and eating He gave wisdom, power, devotion, and discriminatory wisdom and thought process.

gurmukhi: ਦਾਨੇ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਨਾ ਪਵੈ ਬੇਸੁਮਾਰ ਦਾਤਾਰ ਪਿਅਾਰੇ
transliteration: Daanay Keemati Naa Pavai Baysoumaar Daataar Piaaray.
translation: The mysteries of that Bestower cannot be understood; that loving Donor keeps with Him myriad's of virtues.

gurmukhi: ਲੇਖ ਅਲੇਖ ਅਸੰਖ ਅਪਾਰੇ ||੩||
transliteration: Laykh Alaykh Asankh Apaaray ?3?
translation: Beyond all accounts, He is infinite and unfathomable.

gurmukhi: ੪ ਕੁਦਰਤ ਲੇਖੇ ਵਿਚ ਹੈ
translation: The creation is accountable

gurmukhi: ਪੰਜ ਤਤੁ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ਕਰਿ ਖਾਣੀ ਚਾਰਿ ਜਗਤ ੳੁਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Panji Tatu Paravaanu Kari Khaanee Chaari Jagatu Oupaaiaa.
translation: Mixing the five elements from four (life) mines (egg, foetus, sweat, vegetation) the whole world was created.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਚੳੁਰਾਸੀ ਜੂਨਿ ਵਿਚ ਅਾਵਾਗਵਣ ਚਲਤੁ ਵਰਤਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Lakh Chauraaseeh Jooni Vichi Aavaagavan Chalatu Varataaiaa.
translation: Creating the eighty-four lakhs speicies of life, the feat of transmigration has been accomplished in them.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕਸ ੲਿਕਸ ਜੂਨਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਜੀਅ ਜੰਤ ਅਣਗਣਤ ਵਧਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Ikas Ikas Jooni Vichi Jeea Jant Anaganat Vadhaaiaa.
translation: In each one of the species many a creature has been produced.

gurmukhi: ਲੇਖੈ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸਭ ਕੋ ਸਭਨਾ ਮਸਤਕਿ ਲੇਖੁ ਲਿਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Laykhai Andari Sabh Ko Sabhanaa Masataki Laykhu Likhaaiaa.
translation: All are responsible (for their actions) and carry writ of fate on their forehead.

gurmukhi: ਲੇਖੈ ਸਾਸ ਗਿਰਾਸ ਦੇ ਲੇਖ ਲਿਖਾਰੀ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Laykhai Saas Giraas Day Laykh Likhaaree Antu N Paaiaa.
translation: Every breath and morsel is counted. Mystery of writs and that Writer could not be known by any one.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪ ਅਲੇਖੁ ਨ ਅਲਖ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ ||੪||
transliteration: Aapi Alaykhu N Alakhu Lakhaaiaa ?4?
translation: Himself imperceptible, He is beyond all writs.

gurmukhi: ੫ ਕੁਦਰਤ ਭੈ ਵਿਚ ਹੈ
translation: Creation is in fear

gurmukhi: ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਧਰਤਿ ਅਾਗਾਸੁ ਹੈ ਨਿਰਾਧਾਰ ਭੈ ਭਾਰ ਧਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Bhai Vichi Dharati Agaasu Hai Niraadhaar Bhai Bhaari Dharaaiaa.
translation: Earth and sky are in fear but not held by any support, and, that Lord sustains them under the weight of fears.

gurmukhi: ਪੳੁਣੁ ਪਾਣੀ ਬੈਸੰਤਰੋ ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਖੈ ਮੇਲਿ ਮਿਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paounu Paanee Baisantaro Bhai Vichi Rakhai Mayli Milaaiaa.
translation: Keeping air, water and fire in fear (discipline). He has mixed them all (and has created the world).

gurmukhi: ਪਾਣੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਧਰਤਿ ਧਰਿ ਵਿਣੁ ਥੰਮ੍ਹਾ ਅਾਗਾਸੁ ਰਹਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paanee Andari Dharati Dhari Vinu Danmaa Aagaasu Rahaaiaa.
translation: Setting earth in water He has established sky without the support of any props.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਠੈ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਅਗਨਿ ਧਰਿ ਕਰ ਪਰਫੁਲਤੁ ਸੁਫਲ ਫਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kaatdai Andari Agani Dhari Kari Paraphulit Suphalu Phalaaiaa.
translation: He kept fire in wood and loading the trees with flowers and fruits made them meaningful.

gurmukhi: ਨਵੀ ਦੁਅਾਰੀ ਪਵਣੁ ਧਰਿ ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਸੂਰਜੁ ਚੰਦ ਚਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Navee Duaaree Pavanu Dhari Bhai Vichi Sooraju Chand Chalaaiaa.
translation: Keeping air (life) in all the nine doors He made the sun and the moon to move in fear (discipline).

gurmukhi: ਨਿਰਭੳੁ ਅਾਪਿ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਰਾੲਿਅਾ ||੫||
transliteration: Nirabhau Aapi Niranjanu Raaiaa ?5?
translation: That spotless Lord Himself is beyond all fears.

gurmukhi: ੬ ਕਾਦਰ ਬੇਓੜਕ ਪਰ ਵ੍ਰਯਾਪਕ ਹੈ
translation: Creator is infinite and omnipresent

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਅਸਮਾਣ ੳੁਚਾਣਿ ਚੜਿ ੳੁਚਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਨ ਅੰਬੜਿ ਸਕੈ
transliteration: Lakh Asamaan Ouchaani Charhi Ouchaa Hoi N Anbarhi Sakai.
translation: Even mounting the lakhs of sky none can reach that highest Lord.

gurmukhi: ੳੁਚੀ ਹੂ ੳੂਚਾ ਘਣਾ ਥਾੳੁ ਗਿਰਾੳੁ ਨ ਨਾੳੁ ਅਥਕੈ
transliteration: Ouchee Hoon Oochaa Ghanaa Daau Giraau N Naau Adakai.
translation: He is higher than the highest; He has no (particular) place, residence, name and any fatigue.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਪਤਾਲ ਨੀਵਾਣਿ ਜਾੲਿ ਨੀਵਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਨ ਨੀਵੈ ਤਕੈ
transliteration: Lakh Pataal Neevaani Jaai Neevaa Hoi N Neevai Takai.
translation: If someone goes low equal to millions of netherworlds even then he cannot behold Him.

gurmukhi: ਪੂਰਬਿ ਪਛਮਿ ੳੁਤਰਾਧਿ ਦਖਣਿ ਫੇਰਿ ਚੳੁਫੇਰਿ ਨ ਢਕੈ
transliteration: Poorabi Pachhami Outaraadhi Dakhani Dhayri Chaudhayri N Ddhakai.
translation: Even the covers of all the four directions - north, east, south, west, cannot over Him.

gurmukhi: ਓੜਕ ਮੂਲੁ ਨ ਲਭੲੀ ੳੁਤਪਤਿ ਪਰਲੳੁ ਅਖਿ ਫਰਕੈ
transliteration: Aorhak Moolu N Labhaee Aopati Paralau Akhi Dharakai.
translation: His expanse cannot be attained; He by one wink of His eye can create and dissolute (the whole cosmos).

gurmukhi: ਫੁਲਾ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਵਾਸ ਮਹਕੈ ||੬||
transliteration: Phulaan Andari Vaasu Mahakai ?6?
translation: As the fragrance adorns the flower, the Lord also is present everywhere.

gurmukhi: ੭ ਕੁਦਰਤ ਦਾ ਭੇਤ ਕਾਦਰ ਜਾਣਦਾ ਹੈ
translation: Only Creator knows the mystery of creation

gurmukhi: ਓਅੰਕਾਰਿ ਅਕਾਰੁ ਕਰਿ ਥਿਤਿ ਨ ਵਾਰੁ ਨ ਮਾਹੁ ਜਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Aoankaari Akaaru Kari Diti Vaaru N Maahu Janaaiaa.
translation: About the day and month of the creation, the Creator has told nothing to anybody.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰ ਅਾਕਾਰੁ ਵਿਣੁ ੲੇਕੰਕਾਰੁ ਨ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Nirankaaru Aakaaru Vinu Aykankaar N Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.
translation: The Formless One who resided in His own self did not make anybody see His imperceptible form.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ੳੁਪਾੲਿ ਕੈ ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਣਾ ਨਾੳੁਂ ਧਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Oupaai Kai Aapay Apanaa Naau Dharaaiaa.
translation: Himself He created all and Himself He (for the weal of creatures) established His name in their hearts.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਦਿ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਅਾਦੇਸੁ ਹੈ ਹੈ ਭੀ ਹੋਸੀ ਹੋਂਦਾ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Aadi Purakhu Aadaysu Hai Hai Bhee Hosee Hondaa Aaiaa.
translation: I bow before that primal Lord, who is there in the present, who will remain in the future and who was in the beginning as well.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਦਿ ਨ ਅੰਤੁ ਬਿਅੰਤੁ ਹੈ ਅਾਪ ਅਾਪਿ ਨ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Aadi N Antu Biantu Hai Aapay Aapi N Aapu Ganaaiaa.
translation: He is beyond beginning, beyond end and is infinite; but He never makes Himself noticed.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪੁ ੳੁਪਾੲਿ ਸਮਾੲਿਅਾ ||੭||
transliteration: Aapay Aapu Oupaai Samaaiaa ?7?
translation: He created the world and Himself subsumes it in His self.

gurmukhi: ੮ ਕਾਦਰ ਕੀਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਅਗੰਮ ਹੈ
translation: The Creator is inaccessible for the creation

gurmukhi: ਰੋਮ ਰੋਮ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਖਿਓਨੁ ਕਰਿ ਵਰਭੰਡ ਕਰੋੜਿ ਸਮਾੲੀ
transliteration: Rom Rom Vichi Rakhiaonu Kari Varabhand Karorhi Samaaee.
translation: In His one trichome He has subsumed crores of universes.

gurmukhi: ਕੇਵਡੁ ਵਡਾ ਅਾਖੀਅੈ ਕਿਤੁ ਘਰਿ ਵਸੈ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਜਾੲੀ
transliteration: Kayvadu Vadaa Aakheeai Kitu Ghari Vasai Kayvadu Jaaee.
translation: What can be said about His expanse, His abode and the extent of His place?

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕੁ ਕਵਾੳੁ ਅਮਾੳੁ ਹੈ ਲਖ ਦਰੀਅਾੳੁ ਨ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਪਾੲੀ
transliteration: Iku Kavaau Amaau Hai Lakh Dareeaau N Keemati Paaee.
translation: Even His one sentence is beyond all limits and its evaluation cannot be done by millions of rivers of knowledge.

gurmukhi: ਪਰਵਦਗਾਰੁ ਅਪਾਰੁ ਹੈ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰੁ ਨ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲੀ
transliteration: Paravadagaaru Apaaru Hai Paaraavaaru N Alakhu Lakhaaee.
translation: That sustainer of the world is inaccessible; his beginning and end is imperceptible.

gurmukhi: ੲੇਵਡੁ ਵਡਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਕੈ ਕਿਥੈ ਰਹਿਅਾ ਅਾਪੁ ਲੁਕਾੲੀ
transliteration: Ayvadu Vadaa Hoi Kai Kidai Rahiaa Aapu Loukaaee.
translation: Being so much great where has He hidden Himself?

gurmukhi: ਸੁਰ ਨਰ ਨਾਥ ਰਹੇ ਲਿਵ ਲਾੲੀ ||੮||
transliteration: Sur Nar Naad Rahay Liv Laaee ?8?
translation: To know this, the gods, men and many a nath are ever in concentration upon Him.

gurmukhi: ੯ ਕਾਦਰ ਕੀਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਅਗੰਮ ਹੈ
translation: The Creator is inaccessible for the creation

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਦਰੀਅਾੳੁ ਕਵਾੳੁ ਵਿਚਿ ਅਤਿ ਅਸਗਾਹ ਅਥਾਹ ਵਹੰਦੇ
transliteration: Lakh Dareeaau Kavaau Vichi Ati Asagaah Adaah Vahanday.
translation: In His will lakhs of deep and unfathomable rivers (of life) go on flowing.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਦਿ ਨ ਅੰਤੁ ਬਿਅੰਤੁ ਹੈ ਅਗਮ ਅਗੋਚਰ ਫੇਰ ਫਿਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Aadi N Antu Biantu Hai Agam Agochar Dhayr Dhiranday.
translation: Beginning and end of those life currents cannot be understood.

gurmukhi: ਅਲਖੁ ਅਪਾਰੁ ਵਖਾਣੀਅੈ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰੁ ਨ ਪਾਰ ਲਹੰਦੇ
transliteration: Alakhu Apaaru Vakhaaneeai Paaraavaaru N Paar Lahanday.
translation: They are infinite, inaccessible and imperceptible but still all move in the Lord, the great. They cannot know the extent of that imperceptible and boundless Lord.

gurmukhi: ਲਹਰਿ ਤਰੰਗ ਨਿਸੰਗ ਲਖ ਸਾਗਰ ਸੰਗਮ ਰੰਗ ਰਵੰਦੇ
transliteration: Lahari Tarang Nisang Lakh Saagar Sangam Rang Ravanday.
translation: Rivers having myriad's of waves meeting the ocean becomes one with it.

gurmukhi: ਰਤਨ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਲਖ ਲਖ ਮੁਲਿ ਅਮੁਲਿ ਨ ਤੁਲਿ ਤੁਲੰਦੇ
transliteration: Ratan Padaarad Lakh Lakh Muli Amuli N Tuli Tuladay.
translation: In that ocean are lakhs of invaluable jewel materials, which in fact are beyond all costing.

gurmukhi: ਸਦਕੇ ਸਿਰਜਣਹਾਰਿ ਸਿਰੰਦੇ ||੯||
transliteration: Sadakay Sirajanahaari Siranday ?9?
translation: I am sacrifice unto that Creator Lord.

gurmukhi: ੧੦ ਕਾਦਰ ਨਿਰਲੇਪ ਤੇ ਪੂਰਨ ਹੈ
translation: The Creator is detached and perfect

gurmukhi: ਪਰਵਦਗਾਰੁ ਸਲਾਹੀਅੈ ਸਿਰਠਿ ੳੁਪਾੲੀ ਰੰਗ ਬਿਰੰਗੀ
transliteration: Paravadagaaru Salaaheeai Siratdi Oupaaee Rang Birangee.
translation: That sustainer Lord ought to be praised who has created the multicoloured creation.

gurmukhi: ਰਾਜਿਕੁ ਰਿਜਕੁ ਸਬਾਹਿਦਾ ਸਭਨਾ ਦਾਤਿ ਕਰੇ ਅਣਮੰਗੀ
transliteration: Raajiku Rijaku Sabaahidaa Sabhanaa Daati Karay Anamangee.
translation: He is bestower of livelihood to everyone and giver of charity unasked for.

gurmukhi: ਕਿਸੈ ਜਿਵੇਹਾ ਨਾਹਿ ਕੋ ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਮੰਦੀ ਚੰਗੀ
transliteration: Kisai Jivayhaa Naahi Ko Doubidhaa Andari Mandee Changee.
translation: None resembles anyone and the jiva (creative) is good or bad according to the ratio of perplexity in him.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਨਿਰਲੇਪੁ ਹੈ ਪੂਰਨੁ ਬ੍ਹਮੁ ਸਦਾ ਸਹਲੰਗੀ
transliteration: Paarabrahamu Niralaypu Hai Pooranu Brahamu Sadaa Sahalagee.
translation: Being transcendent, He is detached from every thing and being perfect Brahm. He is always with everybody.

gurmukhi: ਵਰਨਾ ਚਿਹਨਾ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਸਭਨਾ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਹੈ ਸਰਬੰਗੀ
transliteration: Varanaan Chihanaan Baaharaan Sabhanaa Andari Hai Sarabangee.
translation: He is beyond caste and symbols etc. but side by side He pervades one and all.

gurmukhi: ਪੳੁਣੁ ਪਾਣੀ ਬੈਸੰਤਰੁ ਸੰਗੀ ||੧੦||
transliteration: Paounu Paanee Baisantaru Sangee ?10?
translation: He is in air, water and fire i.e. He is the power of these elements.

gurmukhi: ੧੧ ਮਾਯਕ ੳੁਤਪਤੀ ਕਾਰਣ
translation: Reasons for the creation of maya

gurmukhi: ਓਅੰਕਾਰਿ ਅਾਕਾਰੁ ਕਰਿ ਮਖੀ ੲਿਕ ੳੁਪਾੲੀ ਮਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Aoankaari Aakaaru Kari Makhee Ik Oupaaee Maaiaa.
translation: The Oankar creating the forms created a fly named maya.

gurmukhi: ਤਿਨਿ ਲੋਅ ਚੳੁਦਹ ਭਵਣੁ ਜਲ ਥਲੁ ਮਹੀਅਲੁ ਛਲੁ ਕਰਿ ਛਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Tini Loa Chaudah Bhavanu Jal Dalu Maheealu Chhalu Kari Chhaaiaa.
translation: It cheated profusely all the three worlds, fourteen abodes, water, surface and the nether world.

gurmukhi: ਬ੍ਹਮਾ ਬਿਸਨ ਮਹੇਸ ਤ੍ਰੈ ਦਸ ਅਵਤਾਰ ਬਜਾਰਿ ਨਚਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Brahamaa Bisan Mahaysu Trai Das Avataar Bajaari Nachaaiaa.
translation: All the ten incarnations, besides Brahma, Visnu, Mahesa, it made to dance in the bazar in the form of world.

gurmukhi: ਜਤੀ ਸਤੀ ਸੰਤੋਖੀਅਾ ਸਿਧ ਨਾਥ ਬਹੁ ਪੰਥ ਭਵਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Jatee Satee Santokheeaa Sidh Naad Bahu Pand Bhavaaiaa.
translation: The celibates, the chaste ones, the contented people, siddhas and naths all were made to move astray on the paths of various sects.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਮ ਕਰੋਧ ਵਿਰੋਧ ਵਿਚਿ ਲੋਭ ਮੋਹੁ ਕਰਿ ਧ੍ਰੋਹ ਲੜਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kaam Karodh Virodh Vichi Lobh Mohu Kari Dhrohu Larhaaiaa.
translation: Maya infused lust, anger, opposition, greed, infatuation, and deceit in all and made them to have infightings.

gurmukhi: ਹੳੁਮੈ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸਭਕੋ ਸੇਰਹੁ ਘਟਿ ਨ ਕਿਨੈ ਅਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Haoumai Andari Sabhu Ko Sayrahu Ghati N Kinai Akhaaiaa.
translation: Full of ego they are hollow from inside but none accepts himself imperfect (all feel they are the full measure and nothing less than it).

gurmukhi: ਕਾਰਣੁ ਕਰਤੇ ਅਾਪੁ ਲੁਕਾੲਿਅਾ ||੧੧||
transliteration: Kaaranu Karatay Aapu Loukaaiaa ?11?
translation: The Creator Lord Himself has concealed the reason for all this.

gurmukhi: ੧੨ ਹੁਕਮ
translation: Majestic orders of the emperors

gurmukhi: ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹਾਂ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਹੈ ਅਬਚਲੁ ਰਾਜੁ ਵਡੀ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੀ
transliteration: Paatisaahaan Paatisaahu Hai Abachalu Raaju Vadee Paatisaahee.
translation: He (the Lord) is emperor of emperors whose rule is stable and kingdom greatly large.

gurmukhi: ਕੇਵਡੁ ਤਖਤੁ ਵਖਾਣੀਅੈ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਮਹਲੁ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਦਰਗਾਹੀ
transliteration: Kayvadu Takhatu Vakhaaneeai Kayvadu Mahalu Kayvadu Daragaahee.
translation: How big are His throne, palace and the court.

gurmukhi: ਕੇਵਡੁ ਸਿਫਤਿ ਸਲਾਹੀਅੈ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਮਾਲੁ ਮੁਲਖੁ ਅਵਗਾਹੀ
transliteration: Kayvadu Sidhati Salaaheeai Kayvadu Maalu Mulakhu Avagaahee.
translation: How should He be eulogised and how could be known the expanse of His treasure and territory?

gurmukhi: ਕੇਵਡੁ ਮਾਣੁ ਮਹਤੁ ਹੈ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਲਸਕਰ ਸੇਵ ਸਿਪਾਹੀ
transliteration: Kayvadu Maanu Mahatu Hai Kayvadu Lasakar Sayv Sipaahee.
translation: How great is His grandeur and magnificence and how many soldiers and armies are there in His service?

gurmukhi: ਹੁਕਮੈ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸਭ ਕੋ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਨ ਬੇਪਰਵਾਹੀ
transliteration: Houkamai Andari Sabh Ko Kayvadu Houkamu N Bayparavaahee.
translation: Everything is under His order is so much organised and powerful that no carelessness is there.

gurmukhi: ਹੋਰਸੁ ਪੁਛਿ ਨ ਮਤਾ ਨਿਬਾਹੀ ||੧੨||
transliteration: Horasu Pouchhi N Mataa Nibaahee ?12?
translation: He asks none to arrange all this.

gurmukhi: ੧੩ ਕੀਤੇ ਨੇ ਕਰਤਾ ਵਿਸਾਰਿਅਾ
translation: The creation forgot the creator

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਲਖ ਬ੍ਹਮੇ ਵੇਦ ਪੜ੍ਹਿ ੲਿਕਸ ਅਖਰ ਭੇਦੁ ਨ ਜਾਤਾ
transliteration: Lakh Lakh Brahamay Vayd Parhhi Ikas Akhar Bhaydu N Jaataa.
translation: Even after reading lakhs of Vedas, Brahma did not understand syllable (paramatama)

gurmukhi: ਜੋਗ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਮਹੇਸ ਲਖ ਰੂਪ ਨ ਰੇਖ ਨ ਭੇਖੁ ਪਛਾਤਾ
transliteration: Jog Dhiaan Mahays Lakh Roop N Raykh N Bhaykh Pachhaataa.
translation: Siva meditates through lakhs of methods (postures) but still could not recognise the form, hue and guise (of the Lord).

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਅਵਤਾਰ ਅਕਾਰ ਕਰਿ ਤਿਲੁ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ਨ ਬਿਸਨ ਪਛਾਤਾ
transliteration: Lakh Avataar Akaar Kari Tilu Vichaar N Bisan Pachhaataa.
translation: Visnu incarnated himself through lakhs of creatures but he could not recognise even a bit of that Lord.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਲਖ ਨੳੁਤਨ ਨਾੳੁ ਲੈ ਲਖ ਲਖ ਸੇਖ ਵਿਸੇਖ ਨ ਤਾਤਾ
transliteration: Lakh Lakh Naoutan Naau Lai Lakh Lakh Saykh Visaykh N Taataa.
translation: Sesanag (the mythical snake) recited and remembered many a new name of the Lord but still could not know much about Him.

gurmukhi: ਚਿਰ ਜੀਵਨੁ ਬਹੁ ਹੰਢਣੇ ਦਰਸਨ ਪੰਥ ਨ ਸਬਦੁ ਸਿਞਞਞਞਾਤਾ
transliteration: Chiru Jeevanu Bah Handdhanay Darasan Pand N Sabadu Siaataa.
translation: Many long-lived persons experienced life variously, but they all and many a philosopher could not understand Sabda, the Brahma.

gurmukhi: ਦਾਤਿ ਲੁਭਾੲਿ ਵਿਸਾਰਨਿ ਦਾਤਾ ||੧੩||
transliteration: Daati Loubhaai Visaarani Daataa ?13?
translation: All got engrossed in the gifts of that Lord and that bestower has been forgotten.

gurmukhi: ੧੪ ਕੀਤਾ ਕਰਤੇ ਨੂੰ ਕਿਕੂੰ ਪਾਵੇ ਗਾਡੀ ਰਾਹ
translation: How creation could attain the Creator? The highway     ?

gurmukhi: ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰ ਅਾਕਾਰੁ ਕਰਿ ਗੁਰ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਹੁੲਿ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਧਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Nirankaar Aakaaru Kari Gur Moorati Hoi Dhiaan Dharaaiaa.
translation: The formless Lord assumed shape and getting established in the form of Guru made all to meditate upon Lord (here the hint is towards Guru Nanak).

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਕਰਿ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚਖੰਡੁ ਵਸਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chaari Varan Gurasikh Kari Saadhasangati Sach Khandu Vasaaiaa.
translation: He accepted disciples from all the four varnas and founded the abode of treuth in the form of holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਵੇਦ ਕਤੇਬਹੁ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Vayd Kataybahu Baaharaa Akad Kadaa Gur Sabadu Sounaaiaa.
translation: He explained the grandeur of that word of the Guru beyond the Vedas and the Katebas.

gurmukhi: ਵੀਹਾ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਵਰਤਮਾਨੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹੋੲਿ ੲਿਕੀਹ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Veehaan Andari Varatamaanu Guramoukhi Hoi Ikeeh Lakhaaiaa.
translation: Those who indulged in scores of evils were now put to meditate upon the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਮਾੲਿਅਾ ਵਿਚਿ ੳੁਦਾਸੁ ਕਰਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਦਾਨੁ ੲਿਸਨਾਨ ਦਿੜਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Maaiaa Vichi Udaasu Kari Naamu Daanu Isanaanu Dirhaaiaa.
translation: They were kept detached amidst maya and were made to understand the importance of that holy name, charity and ablution.

gurmukhi: ਬਾਰਹ ਪੰਥ ੲਿਕਤ੍ਰ ਕਰਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਗਾਡੀ ਰਾਹੁ ਚਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Baarah Pand Ikatr Kari Guramoukhi Gaadee Raahu Chalaaiaa.
translation: Gathering the twelve sects together, he prepared a high path of gurmukhs.

gurmukhi: ਪਤਿ ਪੳੁੜੀ ਚੜਿ ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ ||੧੪||
transliteration: Pati Paurhee Charhi Nij Ghari Aaiaa ?14?
translation: Following that path (or order) and mounting the stairs of honour they have all stabilised in their true selves.

gurmukhi: ੧੫ ਗਾਡੀ ਰਾਹ ਦੇ ਰਾਹੀ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ
translation: Gurmukhs the treaders of the highway

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਾਰਗਿ ਪੈਰ ਧਰਿ ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਵਾਟ ਕੁਵਾਟ ਨ ਧਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Maaragi Pair Dhari Doubidhaa Vaat Kuvaat N Dhaaiaa.
translation: Following the path of being gurmukh man does not read on the wrong way of uncertainty.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਦਰਸਨੁ ਦੇਖਿਕੈ ਮਰਦਾ ਜਾਂਦਾ ਨਦਰਿ ਨ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Satigur Darasanu Daykhi Kai Maradaa Jaandaa Nadari N Aaiaa.
translation: After beholding the true Guru, one does not see life, death, coming and going.

gurmukhi: ਕੰਨੀ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਣਿ ਅਨਹਦ ਰੁਣ ਝੁਣਕਾਰ ਸੁਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kannee Satigur Sabadu Souni Anahad Roun Jhounakaaru Sounaaiaa.
translation: Listening to the world of true Guru he becomes attuned to the unstruck melody.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਰਣੀ ਅਾੲਿ ਕੈ ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਸਾਧੂ ਸੰਗਿ ਮਿਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Satigur Saranee Aai Kai Nihachalu Saadhoo Sangi Milaaiaa.
translation: Coming to the shelter of the true Guru now man absorbs in the stabilising holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਣ ਕਵਲ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਰਸਿ ਸੁਖ ਸੰਪਟ ਵਿਚਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਸਮਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Charan Kaval Makarand Rasi Soukhasanpat Vichi Sahaji Samaaiaa.
translation: He subsumes himself in the delight of the lotus feet.

gurmukhi: ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਅਾਲਾ ਅਪਿੳੁ ਪੀਅਾੲਿਅਾ ||੧੫||
transliteration: Piram Piaalaa Apiu Peeaaiaa ?15?
translation: Gurmukhs remain exhilarated after quaffing the hard to drink the cup of love.

gurmukhi: ੧੬ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਦਾ ਜੀਵਣ ਮੁਕਤ ਪਦ
translation: Gurmukh,the liberated one in life

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਸਾਧਨਾ ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਅਾਲਾ ਅਜਰੁ ਜਰਣਾ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Kari Saadhanaa Piram Piaalaa Ajaru Jaranaa.
translation: Adopting the discipline in the holy congregation, the unbearable cup of love is drunk and endured.

gurmukhi: ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਪਾਖਾਕ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿ ਜੀਵੰਦਿਅਾ ਮਰਣਾ
transliteration: Pairee Pai Paa Khaaku Hoi Aapu Gavaai Jeevandiaan Maranaa.
translation: Then the individual falling at the feet and eschewing ego dies in relation to all the worldly concerns.

gurmukhi: ਜੀਵਣ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਵਖਾਣੀਅੈ ਮਰਿ ਮਰਿ ਜੀਵਣੁ ਡੁਬਿ ਡੁਬਿ ਤਰਣਾ
transliteration: Jeevan Moukati Vakhaaneeai Mari Mari Jeevanu Doubi Doubi Taranaa.
translation: Liberated in life is he who dies of maya and lives up in the love of God.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵਲੀਣੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਪਿਓ ਪੀਅਣੁ ਤੈ ਅੳੁਚਰ ਚਰਣਾ
transliteration: Sabadu Surati Livaleenu Hoi Apiu Peeanu Tai Aouchar Charanaa.
translation: Merging his consciousness in Word and quaffing the nectar he eats up his ego.

gurmukhi: ਅਨਹਦ ਨਾਦ ਅਵੇਸ ਕਰਿ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵਾਣੀ ਨਿਝਰੁ ਝਰਣਾ
transliteration: Anahad Naad Avays Kari Anmrit Vaanee Nijharu Jharanaa.
translation: Inspired by the unstruck melody he always goes on pouring the word-nectar.

gurmukhi: ਕਰਣ ਕਾਰਣ ਸਮਰਥ ਹੋੲਿ ਕਾਰਣੁ ਕਰਣ ਨ ਕਾਰਣ ਕਰਣਾ
transliteration: Karan Kaaran Samaradu Hoi Kaaranu Karanu N Kaaranu Karanaa.
translation: Now he is already cause of all the causes but still does nothing harmful to others.

gurmukhi: ਪਤਿਤ ੳੁਧਾਰਣ ਅਸਰਣ ਸਰਣਾ ||੧੬||
transliteration: Patit Udhaaran Asaran Saranaa ?16?
translation: Such a person salvages the sinners and provides shelter to the shelterless.

gurmukhi: ੧੭ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਦਾ ਤਰਨਾ ਤਾਰਨਾ
translation: Remaining detached and suffering a lot the gurmukh does good to others

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਜੰਮਣਾ ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਹਿਣਾ ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਚਲਣਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Bhai Vichi Janmanaa Bhai Vichi Rahinaa Bhai Vichi Chalanaa.
translation: The gurmukhs take birth in the divine will, they remain in the divine will and move in the divine will.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਭੈ ਭਾੲਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲੁ ਕਰਿ ਅਛਲੁ ਛਲਣਾ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Bhai Bhaai Vichi Bhagati Vachhalu Kari Achhalu Chhalanaa.
translation: In the discipline and love of the holy congregation they fascinate the Lord God also.

gurmukhi: ਜਲ ਵਿਚਿ ਕਵਲੁ ਅਲਿਪਤ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਾਸ ਨਿਰਾਸ ਵਲੇਵੈ ਵਲਣਾ
transliteration: Jal Vichi Kavalu Alipat Hoi Aas Niraas Valayvai Valanaa.
translation: Being detached like lotus in the water they remain away from the cycle of hopes and disappointments.

gurmukhi: ਅਹਰਣਿ ਘਣ ਹੀਰੇ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਅਟਲੁ ਨ ਟਲਣਾ
transliteration: Aharani Ghan Heeray Jougati Guramati Nihachalu Atalu N Talanaa.
translation: They remain steadfast like a diamond in between the hammer and the anvil and live their life deeply rooted in the wisdom of the Guru (gurmati).

gurmukhi: ਪਰੳੁਪਕਾਰ ਵੀਚਾਰਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਜੀਅ ਦੈਅਾ ਮੋਮ ਵਾਂਗੀ ਢਲਣਾ
transliteration: Paraoupakaar Veechaari Vichi Jeea Daiaa Mom Vaangee Dphalanaa.
translation: They always imbibe altruism in their heart and in the sphere of compassion they melt like wax.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ਤੰਬੋਲ ਰਸੁ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿ ਰਲਾੲਿਅਾ ਰਲਣਾ
transliteration: Chaari Varan Tanbol Rasu Aapu Gavaai Ralaaiaa Ralanaa.
translation: As four items mix up in betel and become one, likewise the gurmukhs get adjusted with every one.

gurmukhi: ਵਟੀ ਤੇਲੁ ਦੀਵਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਬਲਣਾ ||੧੭||
transliteration: Vatee Taylu Deevaa Hoi Balanaa ?17?
translation: They, in the form of lamp becoming wick and oil, burn themselves (for lighting others).

gurmukhi: ੧੮ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਾਂ ਦੀ ਮੁਕਤੀ ਦੀ ਜੁਗਤਿ
translation: The pleasure-fruit of the gurmukhs and its grandeur

gurmukhi: ਸਤੁ ਸੰਤੋਖੁ ਦੲਿਅਾ ਧਰਮੁ ਅਰਥ ਕਰੋੜਿ ਨ ਓੜਕੁ ਜਾਣੈ
transliteration: Satu Santokhu Daiaa Dharamu Arad Karorhi N Aorhaku Jaanai.
translation: Crores of properties such as truth, contentment, pity, dharma, lucre are there but none could know the extremity of that (pleasure-fruit).

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਅਾਖੀਅਨਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਲਖੂਣਿ ਨ ਪਲੁ ਪਰਵਾਣੈ
transliteration: Chaar Padaarad Aakheeani Hoi Lakhooni N Palu Paravaanai.
translation: Four ideals are said to be and may be they are multiplied by lakhs, even then they do not equal the one moment of pleasure fruit.

gurmukhi: ਰਿਧੀ ਸਿਧੀ ਲਖ ਲਖ ਨਿਧਿ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਲਖ ਤਿਲੁ ਨ ਤੁਲਾਣੈ
transliteration: Ridhee Sidhee Lakh Lakh Nidhi Nidhaan Lakh Tilu N Tulaanai.
translation: Riddhis, Siddhis and lakhs of treasures do not equal its one small fraction.

gurmukhi: ਦਰਸਨ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਸੰਜੋਗ ਲਖ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਲਖ ਹੈਰਾਣੈ
transliteration: Darasan Drisati Sanjog Lakh Sabad Surati Liv Lakh Hairaanai.
translation: Seeing the intimacy of Word and the consciousness, many combinations of philosophies and meditations are surprised.

gurmukhi: ਗਿਅਾਨ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਸਿਮਰਣ ਅਸੰਖ ਭਗਤਿ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਲਖਨੇਤ ਵਖਾਣੈ
transliteration: Giaan Dhiaan Simaran Asankh Bhagati Jougati Lakh Nayt Vakhaanai.
translation: Many methods of knowledge, meditation and remembrance are put forth;

gurmukhi: ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਅਾਲਾ ਸਹਜਿ ਘਰੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਚੋਜ ਵਿਡਾਣੈ
transliteration: Piram Piaalaa Sahaji Gharu Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Choj Vidaanai.
translation: But reaching the tranquil stage, the pleasure-fruit of the cup of love of the Lord attained by gurmukhs is wondrous.

gurmukhi: ਮਤਿ ਬੁਧਿ ਸੁਧਿ ਲਖ ਮੇਲ ਮਿਲਾਣੈ ||੧੮||
transliteration: Mati Budhi Sudhi Lakh Mayli Milaanai ?18?
translation: At this stage, intellect, wisdom and millions of purities get combined.

gurmukhi: ੧੯ ਸੱਚ ਸ੍ਰੇਸ਼ਟ ਅਾਚਾਰ ਹੈ
translation: Truthfulness is the best conduct

gurmukhi: ਜਪ ਤਪ ਸੰਜਮ ਲਖ ਲਖ ਹੋਮ ਜਗ ਨੲੀਵੇਦ ਕਰੋੜੀ
transliteration: Jap Tap Sanjam Lakh Lakh Hom Jag Naeevayd Karorhee.
translation: Millions of rituals of recitation, penances, continence, burnt offerings and crores of oblations are there.

gurmukhi: ਵਰਤ ਨੇਮ ਸੰਜਮ ਘਣੇ ਕਰਮ ਧਰਮ ਲਖ ਤੰਦੁ ਮਰੋੜੀ
transliteration: Varat Naym Sanjam Ghanay Karam Dharam Lakh Tandu Marorhee.
translation: Fasts, rules, controls, activities are many but they all are like a weak thread.

gurmukhi: ਤੀਰਥ ਪੁਰਬ ਸੰਜੋਗ ਲਖ ਪੁੰਨ ਦਾਨੁ ੳੁਪਕਾਰ ਨ ਓੜੀ
transliteration: Teerad Purab Sanjog Lakh Pounn Daanu Oupakaar N Aorhee.
translation: Many are pilgrimage centres, anniversaries, and millions of virtuous acts, charities and altruism's.

gurmukhi: ਦੇਵੀ ਦੇਵ ਸਰੇਵਣੇ ਵਰ ਸਰਾਪ ਲਖ ਜੋੜ ਵਿਛੋੜੀ
transliteration: Dayvee Dayv Sarayvanay Var Saraap Lakh Jorh Vichhorhee.
translation: Millions kinds of worship of gods and goddesses, combinations, detractions, boons, curses are there.

gurmukhi: ਦਰਸਨ ਵਰਨ ਅਵਰਨ ਲਖ ਪੂਜਾ ਅਰਚਾ ਬੰਧਨ ਤੋੜੀ
transliteration: Darasan Varan Avaran Lakh Poojaa Arachaa Bandhan Torhee.
translation: Many philosophies, varnas, non-varnas and many are the persons who do not bother about the (unnecessary) brands of lakhs of worships and oblations.

gurmukhi: ਲੋਕ ਵੇਦ ਗੁਣ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਲਖ ਜੋਗ ਭੋਗ ਲਖ ਝਾੜਿ ਪਛੋੜੀ
transliteration: Lok Vayd Goun Giaan Lakh Jog Bhog Lakh Jhaarhi Pachhorhee.
translation: Many are the means of public behaviour, virtues, renunciation, indulgence and other covering devices;

gurmukhi: ਸਚਹੁ ਓਰੈ ਸਭ ਕਿਹੁ ਲਖ ਸਿਅਾਣਪ ਸੱਭਾ ਥੋੜੀ
transliteration: Sachahu Aorai Sabh Kihu Lakh Siaanap Sabhaa Dorhee.
translation: But all these are craftsmanship's remain away from the truth; they cannot touch it.

gurmukhi: ੳੁਪਰਿ ਸਚੁ ਅਚਾਰੁ ਚਮੋੜੀ ||੧੯||
transliteration: Oupari Sachu Achaaru Chamorhee ?19?
translation: Higher than truth is truthful living.

gurmukhi: ੨੦ ਸੱਚਾ ਰਾਜ
translation: The true kingdom

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਚਾ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚ ਤਖਤੁ ਸੁਹੇਲਾ
transliteration: Satigur Sachaa Paatisaahu Saadhasangati Sachu Takhatu Suhaylaa.
translation: The true Guru (God) is the true emperor and the holy congregation is true throne which is most delightful.

gurmukhi: ਸਚ ਸਬਦੁ ਟਕਸਾਲ ਸਚੁ ਅਸਟਧਾਤੁ ੲਿਕ ਪਾਰਸ ਮੇਲਾ
transliteration: Sachu Sabadu Takasaal Sachu Asat Dhaatu Ik Paaras Maylaa.
translation: The true Word is such a true mint where different castes in the from of metals meet the Guru, the philosopher's stone, and become gold (gurmukhs).

gurmukhi: ਸਚਾ ਅਬਿਚਲੁ ਰਾਜੁ ਹੈ ਸਚੁ ਮਹਲੁ ਨਵਹਾਣੁ ਨਵੇਲਾ
transliteration: Sachaa Abichal Raaj Hai Sach Mahal Navahaan Navaylaa.
translation: There, only the true divine Will operates because the order of truth alone is bestower of joy and delight.

gurmukhi: ਸਚਾ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਸਚਾ ਅਮਰੁ ਸਚੋ ਰਸ ਕੇਲਾ
transliteration: Sachaa Houkamu Varatadaa Sachaa Amaru Sacho Ras Kaylaa.
translation: There, only the true divine Will operates because the order of truth alone is bestower of joy and delight.

gurmukhi: ਸਚੀ ਸਿਫਤਿ ਸਲਾਹ ਸਚੁ ਸਚੁ ਸਲਾਹਣੁ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵੇਲਾ
transliteration: Sachee Sidhatee Salaah Sachu Sachu Salaahoun Anmrit Vaylaa.
translation: There, in the early morning eulogisation is true and is of the truth alone.

gurmukhi: ਸਚਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥੁ ਹੈ ਸਚੁ ੳੁਪਦੇਸੁ ਨ ਗਰਬਿ ਗਹੇਲਾ
transliteration: Sachaa Guramoukhi Pandu Hai Sachu Oupadays N Garabi Gahaylaa.
translation: There, in the early morning eulogisation is true and is of the truth alone.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਸਾ ਵਿਚਿ ਨਿਰਾਸ ਗਤਿ ਸਚਾ ਖੇਲੁ ਮੇਲੁ ਸਚੁ ਖੇਲਾ
transliteration: Aasaa Vichi Niraas Gati Sachaa Khaylu Maylu Sachu Khaylaa.
translation: Gurmukhs remain detached among many hopes and they always play the game of truth.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਿਖੁ ਗੁਰੂ ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲਾ ||੨੦||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sikhu Guroo Gur Chaylaa ?20?
translation: Such gurmukhs become Guru and the Guru becomes their disciple.

gurmukhi: ੨੧ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਾਂ ਦੀ ਅਲੇਪਤਾ
translation: Non attachment of the gurmukhs

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹੳੁਮੈ ਪਰਹਰੈ ਮਨਿ ਭਾਵੈ ਖਸਮੈ ਦਾ ਭਾਣਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Haoumai Paraharai Mani Bhaavai Khasamai Daa Bhaanaa.
translation: Gurmukh repudiates ego and he likes the will of God.

gurmukhi: ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਪਾਖਾਕ ਹੋੲਿ ਦਰਗਹ ਪਾਵੈ ਮਾਣੁ ਨਿਮਾਣਾ
transliteration: Pairee Pai Paa Khaak Hoi Daragah Paavai Maanu Nimaanaa.
translation: Becoming humble and falling at the feet he becomes dust and earns honour in the court of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਵਰਤਮਾਨ ਵਿਚਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਹੋਵਣਹਾਰ ਸੋੲੀ ਪਰਵਾਣਾ
transliteration: Varatamaan Vichi Varatadaa Hovanahaar Soee Paravaanaa.
translation: He always moves in the present i.e. never ignores the contemporary situations and side by side accepts whatever is likely to happen.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਰਣੁ ਕਰਤਾ ਜੋ ਕਰੈ ਸਿਰਿ ਧਰਿ ਮੰਨਿ ਕਰੈ ਸੁਕਰਾਣਾ
transliteration: Kaaranu Karataa Jo Karai Siri Dhari Manni Karai Soukaraanaa.
translation: Whatever is done by the creator of all the causes, is gratefully accepted by him.

gurmukhi: ਰਾਜੀ ਹੋੲਿ ਰਜਾੲਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਦੁਨੀਅਾਂ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਜਿੳੁ ਮਿਹਮਾਣਾ
transliteration: Raajee Hoi Rajaai Vichi Douneeaan Andari Jiu Mihamaanaa.
translation: He remains happy in the will of the Lord and considers himself a guest in the world.

gurmukhi: ਵਿਸਮਾਦੀ ਵਿਸਮਾਦ ਵਿਚਿ ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਕਾਦਰ ਨੋ ਕੁਰਬਾਣਾ
transliteration: Visamaadee Visamaad Vichi Kudarati Kaadar No Kurabaanaa.
translation: He remains elated in the love of the Lord and goes sacrificed unto the feats of the creator.

gurmukhi: ਲੇਪ ਅਲੇਪ ਸਦਾ ਨਿਰਬਾਣਾ ||੨੧||
transliteration: Layp Alayp Sadaa Nirabaanaa ?21?
translation: Living in the world he remains detached and liberated.

gurmukhi: ੨੨ ਬੰਦੇ ਵਿਖੇ
translation: The obedient person always in obedience

gurmukhi: ਹੁਕਮੀ ਬੰਦਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਕੈ ਸਾਹਿਬੁ ਦੇ ਹੁਕਮੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਹਣਾ
transliteration: Houkamee Bandaa Hoi Kai Saahibu Day Houkamai Vichi Rahanaa.
translation: One should remain in the will of the Lord by becoming an obedient servant.

gurmukhi: ਹੁਕਮੈ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸਭ ਕੋ ਸਭਨਾ ਅਾਵਟਣ ਹੈ ਸਹਣਾ
transliteration: Houkamai Andari Sabh Ko Sabhanaa Aavatan Hai Sahanaa.
translation: All are in His will and all have to bear the heat of the divine order.

gurmukhi: ਦਿਲੁ ਦਰੀਅਾੳੁ ਸਮਾੳੁ ਕਰਿ ਗਰਬੁ ਗਵਾੲਿ ਗਰੀਬੀ ਵਹਣਾ
transliteration: Dilu Dareeaau Samaau Kari Garabu Gavaai Gareebee Vahanaa.
translation: Man should make his heart a river and let the water of humility flow into it.

gurmukhi: ਵੀਹ ੲਿਕੀਹ ੳੁਲੰਘਿ ਕੈ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਿੰਘਾਸਣਿ ਬਹਣਾ
transliteration: Veeh Ikeeh Ulaghi Kai Saadhasangati Singhaasani Bahanaa.
translation: Leaving the worldly activities one should sit on the throne of holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵਲੀਣ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਨਭੳੁ ਅਘੜ ਘੜਾੲੇ ਗਹਣਾ
transliteration: Sabadu Surati Livaleenu Hoi Anabhau Agharh Gharhaaay Gahanaa.
translation: Merging consciousness in the Word, one should get the ornament of fearlessness prepared.

gurmukhi: ਸਿਦਕ ਸਬੂਰੀ ਸਾਬਤਾ ਸਾਕਰੁ ਸੁਕਰਿ ਨ ਦੇਣਾ ਲਹਣਾ
transliteration: Sidak Sabooree Saabataa Saakaru Soukari N Daynaa Lahanaa.
translation: One should remain true in faith and contentment; the transaction of thankfulness should be kept to continue and one should remain away from worldly give and take.

gurmukhi: ਨੀਰਿ ਨ ਡੁਬਣੁ ਅਗਿ ਨ ਦਹਣਾ ||੨੨||
transliteration: Neeri N Doubanu Agi N Dahanaa ?22?
translation: Such a person neither drowns in water (of maya) nor gets burnt in the fire (of desire).

gurmukhi: ੨੩ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਤੇ ਸਿੱਖ ਦੀ ਪ੍ਰੀਤੀ
translation: Love between the Guru and the disiple

gurmukhi: ਮਿਹਰ ਮੁਹਬਤਿ ਅਾਸਕੀ ੲਿਸਕੁ ਮੁਸਕੁ ਕਿੳੁ ਲੁਕੈ ਲੁਕਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Mihar Muhabati Aasakee Isaku Mousaku Kiu Loukai Loukaaiaa.
translation: Kindness, affection, passionate love and smell do not remain concealed even if they are hidden and of their own get manifested.

gurmukhi: ਚੰਦਨ ਵਾਸ ਵਣਾਸਪਤਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਸੁਗੰਧੁ ਨ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chandan Vaasu Vanaasapati Hoi Sougandhu N Aapu Ganaaiaa.
translation: Sandal makes the whole vegetation fragrant and never makes it self noticed (but still people come to know that).

gurmukhi: ਨਦੀਅਾ ਨਾਲੇ ਗੰਗ ਮਿਲਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਵਿਤੁ ਨ ਅਾਖਿ ਸੁਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Nadeeaan Naalay Gang Mili Hoi Pavitu N Aakhi Sounaaiaa.
translation: Rivers and streams meet the Ganges and silently become pure without any announcement.

gurmukhi: ਹੀਰੇ ਹੀਰਾ ਬੇਧਿਅਾ ਅਣੀ ਕਣੀ ਹੋੲਿ ਰਿਦੈ ਸਮਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Heeray Heeraa Baydhiaa Anee Kanee Hoi Ridai Samaaiaa.
translation: The diamond is cut by the diamond and the cutter diamond looks as if it has adopted the other diamond in its heart (likewise the Guru also cutting the mind of disciple gives place to him in his own heart).

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਸਾਧ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਾਰਸ ਮਿਲਿ ਪਾਰਸ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Mili Saadh Hoi Paaras Mili Paaras Hoi Aaiaa.
translation: The disciple of the Guru becomes such a sadhu in the holy congregation as if someone becomes philosopher's stone after touching the philosopher's stone.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਹਚੳੁ ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਗੁਰਮਤੀ ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਛਲੁ ਛਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Nihachau Nihachalu Guramatee Bhagati Vachhalu Hoi Achhalu Chhalaaiaa.
translation: With the steadfast teaching of the Guru, the mind of the Sikh becomes peaceful and God also becoming affectionate towards the devotee gets deluded.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ ||੨੩||੧੮||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Alakhu Lakhaaiaa ?23?18?atdaaraan?
translation: Getting a sight of the imperceptible Lord is the pleasure-fruit for the gurmukhs.

gurmukhi: ਦਰਸ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਦਿਬਿ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਪ੍ਰਗਾਸ ਭੲੀ ਕਰੁਨਾ ਕਟਾਛ ਦਿਬਿ ਦੇਹ ਪਰਵਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Daras Dhiaan Dibi Drisati Pragaas Bhaee , Karounaa Kataachh Dibi Dayh Paravaan Hai ?
translation: Focusing mind on the form of True Guru, one is enlightened with celestial vision of knowledge. By the grace of True Guru, the human form acquires Godly refulgence making its coming to this world a success.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਬਜਰ ਕਪਾਟ ਖੁਲੇ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰਸ ਰਸਨਾ ਕੈ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Bajar Kapaat Khulay , Praym Ras Rasanaa Kai Anmrit Nidhaan Hai ?
translation: Concentrating the mind on the divine word, the rock strong doors of ignorance become ajar. The acquisition of knowledge then blesses one with the treasure of Lord's name.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਕਮਲ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਬਾਸਨਾ ਸੁਬਾਸ ਹਸਤ ਪੂਜਾ ਪ੍ਰਨਾਮ ਸਫਲ ਸੁ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Charan Kamal Makarand Baasanaa Soubaasa , Hasat Poojaa Pranaam Sadhal Su Giaan Hai ?
translation: The touching and feeling of the dust of True Guru's feet enlivens the fragrance of Lord's name in the mind. Involving the hands in His prayer and service, one is blessed with true and real spiritual knowledge.

gurmukhi: ਅੰਗ ਅੰਗ ਬਿਸਮ ਸ੍ਰਬੰਗ ਮੈ ਸਮਾੲਿ ਭੲੇ ਮਨ ਮਨਸਾ ਥਕਤ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਹੈ ||੧੮||
transliteration: Ang Ang Bisam Srabang Mai Samaai Bhaay , Man Manasaa Dakat Braham Dhiaan Hai ?18?
translation: Thus every hair of a person becomes glorious and he merges with the light divine. All his vices and desires end and his mind dwells in the love of Lord's feet. (18)
